snippet: The International Association of Athletics Federations, track and field’s governing body, announced that 28 athletes had been caught in retests of their doping samples from the 2005 and 2007 world championships.
abstract: Retests of old blood samples by International Assn of Athletics Federations reveal that 28 athletes were doping at the 2005 and 2007 track and field world championships; names of athletes are not disclosed.
lead_paragraph: The International Association of Athletics Federations, track and field’s governing body, announced that 28 athletes had been caught in retests of their doping samples from the 2005 and 2007 world championships.
